Playground Node 1: Place a maker order to sell onchain BTC for LNBTC

body.raw:
{
    "userpass": "00ahk2jd0z!1JRm#F9e2",
    "method": "setprice", // This method places an order in the order book, the "uuid" field in the response will be used to check the order status
    "base": "tBTC-TEST-segwit", // Node 1 wants to sell onchain testnet BTC
    "rel": "tBTC-TEST-lightning", // Node 1 wants to buy lightning testnet BTC
    "price": 1, // The price for 1 LNtBTC (1 LNtBTC = 1 tBTC)
    "volume": 0.0001 // The amount of onchain testnet BTC Node 1 wants to sell (If the order is matched Node 1 shall recieve 0.00001 LNBTC) - Note that in the current Node 1 & 2 setup the volume should be less than 0.0002 LNBTC, this is the max amount to be sent on the channel, Node 2 can open more channels to Node 1 or other nodes and and get more outbound liquidity to be able to trade more LNBTC.
}

item.name: Playground Node 2: Buy onchain BTC for LNBTC

body.raw:
{
    "userpass": "E3vI9p#Srtz3axn!jQDQ",
    "method": "buy", // This method issues a buy request and attempts to match an order from the orderbook based on the provided price and volume
    "base": "tBTC-TEST-segwit",
    "rel": "tBTC-TEST-lightning",
    "price": 1,
    "volume": 0.0001
}
